data.name: Dino Hazard®: Chronos Blackout Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The soundtrack to Dino Hazard, composed by various artists and curated by the Bone Collectors. This soundtrack is fully up to date, and includes 39 tracks. Provided in mp3 format.
data.about_the_game: The soundtrack to Dino Hazard, composed by various artists and curated by the Bone Collectors. This soundtrack is fully up to date, and includes 39 tracks. Provided in mp3 format.
data.short_description: The soundtrack to Dino Hazard, composed by various artists and curated by the Bone Collectors. This soundtrack is fully up to date, and includes 39 tracks. Provided in mp3 format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Your computer must be able to play mp3 files
